projectsData.title: Pong Vice
projectsData.description: The 'Pong Vice' project is a Pong gaming platform developed for 42 School. Built with Vue 3, NestJS, and PostgreSQL, all containerized in Docker, the app features real-time gaming, matchmaking, and chat. It also includes advanced user account management with Two-Factor Authentication. The design is fully responsive and offers login options through 42 Intra or Discord.

projectsData.title: Next Space
projectsData.description: Next Space is a modern reinvention of the social networking site https://mynxtspace.vercel.app/, developed using the fullstack framework Next.js 13 and TypeScript. The project is fully serverless, using Neon database and Prisma. It also integrates NextAuth.js for robust user authentication. The entire project is deployed on Vercel, providing a complete solution for a social network without a separate back-end.

projectsData.title: Space Tourism
projectsData.description: Space Tourism is a space tourism website developed using Next and TypeScript. The project is fully responsive and features custom carousels and design constraints. The website is deployed on Vercel and can be accessed at https://space-tourism-jurichar.vercel.app/
